cause.description:
Due to the growing count of AIDS/HIV and any other sexually transmitted desease infected patients in the U.S. I want to urge those who join this group to practice safe sex and always encourage the use of a condomn during and engageing in sexual intercourse. If you fell that you have had unprotected sex with multiple partners you should get tested or ask your Doctor were the nearest clinic is so you can be tested
1. Fight against AIDs/HIV in Africa
2. Support to those infected with AIDs/HIV
3. Urge people to USE A CONDOMN during sex
cause.mission: combat AIDS/HIV and any sexually transmitted disease
cause.name: Fight against AIDs/HIV
